errors.title: Low Pressure Fault
errors.meaning: Refrigerant pressure too low during run cycle.
errors.fix: Check water flow, ambient temperature, and refrigerant charge.

errors.title: High Pressure Fault
errors.fix: Clean condenser coil, check fan operation, verify refrigerant charge.

errors.title: Flow Switch Open
errors.meaning: Water flow insufficient or switch open.
errors.fix: Ensure pump is on and filter clean; replace flow switch if open with flow.

errors.title: Freeze Sensor Fault
errors.meaning: Freeze sensor resistance out of range.
errors.fix: Measure at 77 °F ≈ 10 kΩ; replace if open or shorted.

errors.title: Temperature Sensor Fault
errors.meaning: Water temperature sensor open or shorted.
errors.fix: Verify ~10 kΩ @ 77 °F; replace if out of range.
